alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 24 at 6:39PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CHICOT AND NORTHEASTERN ASHLEY COUNTIES... At 639 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Montrose, or 15 miles west of Lake Village, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Lake Village around 655 PM CDT. Mcmillan Corner around 700 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
